talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Haha, it's natural that you wouldn't
understand... If anything, I'd rather
you DIDN'T understand.
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What do you mean, "indeed"?<sp:5:0:0> There's
no way you understand! You, you...
intellectual charlatan!
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So it seems like...<sp:0:4:0>That bit moves this way and does that,<sp:5:1:0>
and this one comes over here like so,
then suddenly that does this.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Or so it seems, at least... You know what
I mean?
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_00>Falling for it again, are you? You really
are a fool.
talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Master Kohga! I shall purge the world of
this meddlesome nuisance!<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
near_0000: So if that does that, then...
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If that goes like this, then this happens.
But then that has to be like this or else...

Ugh, I don't get it at all...


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Do you get it?
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's an awfully fresh outfit... A newbie,
I take it? I understand wanting to show
off your duds, but...
we DO work in secret, you know. Keep
making such amateur mistakes, and
I won't help you if Link attacks.
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I understand wanting to show off the new
outfit, but we work in secret.

If you don't keep that in mind, I won't lift
a finger to help you if Link attacks.
